attributes.description:
From smartphone pairing, simplified parking and impressive safety features to a perfectly polished exterior, the Hyundai Venue is built for those with a desire to achieve more.
With high-tech features like Apple CarPlay that allows you to navigate your next adventure, stream your favourite music apps, make and receive phone calls – the Venue promises a whole new driving experience.
The Hyundai Venue is packed with features to ensure your safety. Enjoy a six-airbag system, Rear Parking Assist, with ABS and EBD that promises stability at all times.

Nationwide delivery. All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us today! Price excludes on the road fees.
